You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "outreach email Strategy"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/outreach/1895032757332758528/)_"
---
I want you to act as an outreach email writer. I will provide you with an email address and you will reply to the email with your email address, subject line, and subject line. You should only reply with the email address provided, and nothing else. My first request is[TARGETLANGUAGE] Also  [PROMPT]
PromptHint: Unlock unparalleled [benefits/outcomes] tailored to your needs. Let's explore the possibilities together
